nodes.bodyText: We should be importing icons from Patternfly -  @patternfly/react-icons probably?

I started to comment in the code but realized I need a more general comment. I'm a little confused as to why we need to manually adjust so many things to do with the icon in the EmptyStateComponent. And it looks like there are some deprecated props that we are using. (there might be newly deprecated, I'm not sure) https://www.patternfly.org/v4/documentation/react/components/emptystate
Also, I assume we need to do this because we can't know for sure until loading that there are no child processes? Otherwise we just wouldn't put the expansion on, right?

Yes Sarah, so I thought we should show the carets uniformly , and only when we expand it ,we would know if the child is present or not.

Yes Sarah, so I thought we should show the carets uniformly , and only when we expand it ,we would know if the child is present or not.

I talked with @kywalker-rh about this - we agree that normally if there is nothing in the expansion,  we just would not show the expansion. So I just want to ask the question of whether we need this empty state, or if we just don't have the expansion caret. I'm imagining maybe since this list is highly dynamic, when the list is rendered there are no children, but maybe then they would appear, so we want to be able to expand anytime? It's a little bit of a stretch so I wanted to ask. @cristianonicolai any thoughts?

@srambach - The children are not loaded initially. So at this point we wouldn't know if the parent has the children or not. Only when we click on the caret and expand it, we would run a query for fetching the children and at this point if the children are empty then we show the no process available. @cristianonicolai - am I correct?
We should be able to use the empty state to put the icon in and size and position it correctly.
@srambach - if the size and color prop of empty state icon are deprecated, then how do we define the color and size of the icons
I've sparked a little conversation over on patternfly-react about what should be configurable on an empty state. Let's leave the props alone and maybe revisit empty states another day.
